com.facebook.concurrency

Class FutureHelper<T,E extends Exception>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<T>
      • com.facebook.concurrency.FutureHelper<T,E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, Future<T>, RunnableFuture<T>

    public class FutureHelper<T,E extends Exception>
extends FutureTask<T>
    helper class that decorates FutureTask.get(): 1. handles FutureTask exceptions according to a handler 2. runs the underlying task at most once 3. returns the result

    • Constructor Summary

      • safeGet

        public T safeGet()
          throws E extends Exception
        runs the task once. Other threads will block if another is running the task.

        result of computation
